18.1.3. Removed MPI-1 Datatypes


Up: Removed MPI-1 Bindings Next: Removed MPI-1 Constants Previous: Removed MPI-1 Functions

Table 25 shows the removed MPI-1 datatypes and their replacements.


Table 25: Removed MPI-1 datatypes. The indicated routine may be used for changing the lower and upper bound respectively.

Removed MPI-2 Replacement
MPI_LB MPI_TYPE_CREATE_RESIZED
MPI_UB MPI_TYPE_CREATE_RESIZED
